text: Lag da Pigniu (or Panixer Stausee) is a reservoir above Pigniu (Panix) in the Grisons, Switzerland. The 53 m gravity dam was completed in 1989. It is operated by Kraftwerke Ilanz AG. ==See also== *List of lakes of Switzerland *List of mountain lakes of Switzerland ==External links== *Swiss dams: Panix * Category:Reservoirs in Switzerland Category:Lakes of Graubünden
title: Lag da Pigniu
